page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: This block is mainly agricultural land with two very small villages, both of ancient origin-{Braceby and Sapperton form a Parish, the Western Boundary is an Ancient Green Lane known as "Long Hollow". The village of{Haceby}(pop 4) is on the Northern Boundary & {Pickworth}(pop 75) is on the South East.{ Humby Mill}is an isolated house between and to the west of Br.& S. The major{landowner}is Welby Estates of Denton, Lincs.The population had steadily declined until early 1970's when some properties in Br. were sold by the Estate. Sapperton had two Council Houses and these have now also been sold. The populations have now stabilised,unless further empty houses are sold there can be no more influx. New building forbidden-no{main drains. {Electricity & mains water supplies} since l950s but no{gas}supply.
